What are your business hours?: We are open 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday, (EST).
How do I return an item?: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase. Please visit our returns portal at company.com/returns to start the process.
What is your shipping policy?: We offer standard shipping (5-7 business days) and express shipping (1-2 business days). All orders over $50 qualify for free standard shipping.
How do I reset my password?: You can reset your password by clicking the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. An email will be sent to you with instructions.
